items.sentence: This is the best Christmas I\'ve had in years.
This is the best party I\'ve been to all year.
I think I shouldn\'t have told Tom about that.
I think I wouldn\'t enjoy doing that with Tom.
I think I\'d better do what Tom told me to do.
I think I\'ll be able to help you next Monday.
You know better than to do that kind of thing.
You should come back home before it gets dark.
You should tell Tom why you disagree with him.
You yourself need to learn how to drive a car.
